div.p: HAWAII. I CAN’T GO BUT HAPPY FOR THOSE
WHO CAN. >>> ON TUESDAY IN BAKERSFIELD,
CALIFORNIA, AN AMAZING THING HAPPENED, FOUR-YEAR-OLD BOY
JEREMY WAS ATTACKED BY A DOG BUT SAVED BY HIS CAT TARA.
>> WHAT DID SHE DO FOR YOU, HUH? >> SHE RESCUED ME.
>> INDEED, THAT CAT TARA RESCUED THAT FOUR-YEAR-OLD BOY JEREMY,
THE WHOLE THING ON SECURITY VIDEO IN FRONT OF THE FAMILY’S
HOME. JEREMY IS PLAYING WHILE MOM OFF
CAMERA IS WATERING. THE OTHER CAMERA CAPTURES THE
DOG, WHICH WE’RE TOLD HAS NEVER ATTACKED BEFORE GO TOWARDS
JEREMY, AND THEN HE JUST POUNCES ON HIM, BUT HERE COMES TARA THE
CAT. SHE LITERALLY CHASES THAT DOG
AWAY. >> YOU CAN SEE HER PROTECT HIM,
LIKE SHE COMES UP, SHE COMES BACK TO HIM.
>> I REMEMBER HER HITTING THE DOG, BUT SEEING THE VIDEO AND
SEEING EXACTLY WHAT SHE DID AND CHASED THAT DOG AWAY, SEEING HER
TURN TO CHECK ON JEREMY AND THEN RETURNING TO HIM, SHE IS MY
HERO. >> THE BITE IS PRETTY DEEP, TWO
GOUGES AND QUITE A FEW STITCHES, BUT JEREMY IS GOING TO BE OKAY.
>> AMAZING, ISN’T THAT NOT AMAZING?
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY IN GENERAL, PETS ARE GOOD FOR KIDS,
TEACH THE URCHINS LOYALTY AND TEACH AFFECTION THAT WILL BE
REMEMBERED. CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS WEBSITE
THAT IS DIFFERENT FROM BILLOREILLY.COM AND SPOUT OFF
